title: VERY HIGH PING PROBLEM ON VERY HIGH SETTING
body: Whenever i turn league graphics setting above medium my ping starts to skyrocket and i get massive lag. Is there anyway to fix this? I just got a new desktop and my ping is always 34 on medium. I get 400fps on medium settings and my desktop can handle ultra high, i just need to get the ping down.

replies.body: Graphics settings are localized and should generally have no affect on your connection to the server. Are you seeing your actual latency (ping) change, or is there a visual change in how your champion moves after you crank up the graphics settings? For most changes in latency, the guide *Rineyy* linked is a good starting point in solving the issue. Let me know a bit more context on what's going on and I'll be able to help further.
I see an actual ping change when i turn up the graphics settings past medium. I also did most of the steps on that article already.
To ensure all the common solutions have been tried, I suggest working through the steps you haven't already tried. If you still see issues, let me know.
Pretty sure my internet is just shitty right now. I am using a brand new desktop with wifi temporarily so ill switch to ethernet and it will prob be all good.

It appears you're still having issues with your latency, based on your other posts in this thread. I recommend reaching out to our tech specialists through [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be more than happy to assist with this further, just be sure to provide them a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool. ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs)

Let me know if you have any further questions.
Already did nothing seems to work to fix the ping problem on the very high setting

Are you sure it's a ping issue you're experiencing and not an FPS issue? As Targons Blade mentioned, Graphics settings are localized and should generally have no affect on your connection to the server.

I honestly have no idea it says i am getting like 200fps on the very high setting but my ping goes up really high and it gets really laggy. When i turn it to medium, the ping goes back down and it is playable again.
I'm 100% sure you don't know what ping means.

Okay well all i know is that my computer can handle high graphics settings and my ping goes up high when i use the high graphics setting on my wifi for some reason. Also my ping is right next to my fps settings so i mean if thats not ping then whatever.
My only guess is that then when you turn your graphics up to high, your graphics card is already has a full load so your cpu has to handle the load, and cant process the network packets fast enough
Oh okay i fixed the problem now i just use wired internet and it works fine. Btw i have an i7 6700 with a R9 360.
